actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law

official_title: To amend the Bankruptcy Act to make small business investment companies and specialized small business investment companies ineligible to file bankruptcy, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Bankruptcy Act to make ineligible for the filing of bankruptcy petitions small business investment companies and specialized small business investment companies organized under the Small Business Investment Act of 1958.

titles.title: To amend the Bankruptcy Act to make small business investment companies and specialized small business investment companies ineligible to file bankruptcy, and for other purposes.
